name: Museum Terror 3D
description:
Do you think it is scary to spend the whole night in museum? Now you can experience it and get the huge adrenaline dose. Just imagine that you are a night watchman and you are watching museum halls through security cameras. What’s this? Have the statues changed their postures? Is the mummy going here?! Aaaaaaa!!!

HOW TO PLAY:
Watch museum halls through the observation cameras. Exhibits move only when you are not looking at them. Your goal is to survive, cause there are some dangerous creatures among exhibits like mummy or dinosaurs figures. Switch the cameras and don’t let the exhibits to come into night watchman’s room – in that case you will not see the dawn…

Museum Terror 3D - Night Of Fear features:
- Thrilling atmosphere of museum at night – it makes feel tingles down your spine
- Different types of exhibits: statues, mummy, dinosaurs, knight’s armors, stuffed animals.
- Perfect way to check your self-control
- The game will fresh you up, but try not to play at night!

Our new application will make you shake with fear and prove that there is no time to be bored in the museum. Try to survive in museum, but remember – you are not alone here!
